item.title: Linear Regression
item.description: Introduction Linear Regression is one of the most simple, intuitive, and widely used modeling technique which primarily predicts a quantitative response and thus falls under classification of Supervised Learning. A search on Google Scholar for the term “Linear Regression” returns 4+ million result and there are many good quality courses available online explaining Linear Regression for free. Today there are many sophisticated techniques available for predictive and prescriptive analytics but a solid foundation in Linear Regression is must to understand nuances of modeling before dealing with more advanced techniques.
